title: Most Satisfying Ultimate to land
body:
Hey guys,

What ultimate ability do you think is the most satisfying to land? Regardless of what it does, which ultimate gives you the best feeling when you successfully pull it off?

For me itâ€™s an at-least-4-man Shockwave. :)
{{champion:61}} {{champion:61}} {{champion:61}} {{champion:61}} {{champion:61}}

replies.body: Although Cho'Gath's is targeted there's still is a bit of satisfaction in getting a stack from killing a champion

{{champion:59}} 

regardless of how many people i trap

its fun jumping on adcs
in my head im like
'DEMARCIA FU.CKERS'

im going to come out of left field and say a {{champion:51}}  Caitlyn ult.
because watching them run around in a futile attempted to block it and just knowing there dead before you hear "you have slain..." or whatever for me; is just so satisfying. apart from that any cross-map ({{champion:222}} jinx, {{champion:22}} Ashe, etc) is also quite satisfying.
i always land this, but it's always satisfying seeing other people land it instead of it cutting short, i mean, good job you know how to use fizz
A {{champion:111}} ult go off and hit EVER SINGLE enemy........good times.......
I dunno, but I feel like landing a 5 man Amumu ult is pretty good.

It is always satisfying to land a cross-map like {{champion:22}} Ashe, {{champion:222}} Jinx, {{champion:81}} Ezreal, etc

And then there are the support AoE ults. My person favourite, landing a 5-man-mid-team-fight ult with {{champion:25}} Morgana

however, there is an ult that no one dares mention, for the horror of it brings nightmares into the victims eyes and pure hatred boils up for the creature responsible, so much so it poison's the player's mind and makes him toxic, even to the point of lane swapping or quitting the game all together. 

His name...


{{champion:17}}  Teemo

Zed's ult... I always miss it. :D

-GL,HF
A whole team stun with{{champion:25}} 's Ult
5 man {{champion:68}} ult. gamechanger.

1. A super slick Lee play to win a fight.
2. Ori Ult -> Flash to surprise catch a few carries and insta kill em.
{{champion:59}}  the dunkmaster, or watching full AP {{champion:8}}  and counting down the seconds till the carries go pop

{{champion:22}} 
AP Ashe full-map ulti.
definitely a wombo combo of {{champion:201}}  and {{champion:111}} however i have only done this once as brautilous scares most people when you want to try it in bot. but the ult combo is nerdgasmic
1. {{champion:81}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:22}} {{champion:119}}

in my opinion landing a perfect Wukong {{champion:62}} ultimate is heaps good you do so much damage and can win a teamfight by yourself with it. But a succesful sivir ulti engage is pretty sick as well especially when you ace them right after {{champion:15}}

{{champion:11}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:13}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:57}} {{champion:58}} {{champion:75}} {{champion:4}} {{champion:77}} {{champion:126}} {{champion:51}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:84}} {{champion:19}} {{champion:62}}
{{champion:81}}
{{champion:77}}

Kalista. No comparison.

Needless to say, much easier with a friend.

Multiple Kat ults.

I especially love how skillful I feel to press all the buttons many times and be rewarded for playing dumb :)
{{champion:222}}
